title: PowerShell Downgrade Attack - 9E91926E
description: Detects PowerShell downgrade attack by comparing the host versions with the actually used engine version 2.0
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Windows PowerShell" AND (EventID = "400" AND EngineVersion LIKE "2.%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (HostVersion LIKE "2.%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious PowerShell Download - 09FD3C27
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND Message LIKE "%System.Net.WebClient%" ESCAPE '\' AND (Message LIKE "%.DownloadFile(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%.DownloadString(%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious PowerShell Keywords - 85E21715
description: Detects keywords that could indicate the use of some PowerShell exploitation framework
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (Message LIKE "%System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%[System.Reflection.Assembly]::Load%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%[Reflection.Assembly]::Load%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%System.Reflection.AssemblyName%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%SuspendThread%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Malicious PowerShell Commandlets - 02C3F2E5
description: Detects Commandlet names from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (Message LIKE "%Invoke-DllInjection%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Shellcode%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-WmiCommand%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-GPPPassword%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-Keystrokes%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-TimedScreenshot%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-VaultCredential%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-CredentialInjection%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Mimikatz%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-NinjaCopy%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-TokenManipulation%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Out-Minidump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%VolumeShadowCopyTools%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ReflectivePEInjection%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-UserHunter%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Find-GPOLocation%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ACLScanner%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-DowngradeAccount%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ServiceUnquoted%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ServiceFilePermission%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ServicePermission%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ServiceAbuse%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Install-ServiceBinary%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-RegAutoLogon%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-VulnAutoRun%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-VulnSchTask%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-UnattendedInstallFile%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ApplicationHost%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-RegAlwaysInstallElevated%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-Unconstrained%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Add-RegBackdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Add-ScrnSaveBackdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Gupt-Backdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ADSBackdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Enabled-DuplicateToken%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PsUaCme%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Remove-Update%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Check-VM%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-LSASecret%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-PassHashes%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Show-TargetScreen%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Port-Scan%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PoshRatHttp%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PowerShellTCP%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PowerShellWMI%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Add-Exfiltration%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Add-Persistence%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Do-Exfiltration%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Start-CaptureServer%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ChromeDump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-ClipboardContents%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-FoxDump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-IndexedItem%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-Screenshot%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Inveigh%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-NetRipper%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-EgressCheck%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PostExfil%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PSInject%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-RunAs%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%MailRaider%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%New-HoneyHash%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Set-MacAttribute%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-DCSync%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PowerDump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Exploit-Jboss%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ThunderStruck%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-VoiceTroll%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Set-Wallpaper%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-InveighRelay%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PsExec%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-SSHCommand%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-SecurityPackages%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Install-SSP%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-BackdoorLNK%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PowerBreach%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-SiteListPassword%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-System%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-BypassUAC%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Tater%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-WScriptBypassUAC%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PowerUp%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PowerView%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Get-RickAstley%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Find-Fruit%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%HTTP-Login%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Find-TrustedDocuments%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Paranoia%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-WinEnum%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ARPScan%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-PortScan%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-ReverseDNSLookup%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-SMBScanner%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-Mimikittenz%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Invoke-AllChecks%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (logs MATCH ('"Get-SystemDriveInfo"')))

title: Windows PowerShell Web Request - B5C01B78
description: Detects the use of various web request methods (including aliases) via Windows PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4688" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%Invoke-WebRequest%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%iwr %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%wget %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%curl %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Net.WebClient%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Start-BitsTransfer%" ESCAPE '\'))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4104" AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Invoke-WebRequest%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%iwr %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%wget %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%curl %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Net.WebClient%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Start-BitsTransfer%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: WMImplant Hack Tool - 1ADADA78
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE "%WMImplant%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% change\_user %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% gen\_cli %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% command\_exec %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% disable\_wdigest %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% disable\_winrm %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% enable\_wdigest %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% enable\_winrm %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% registry\_mod %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% remote\_posh %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% sched\_job %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% service\_mod %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% process\_kill %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% active\_users %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% basic\_info %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% power\_off %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% vacant\_system %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% logon\_events %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Remote PowerShell Session - 56A62BF2
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID IN ("4103", "400") AND HostName = "ServerRemoteHost" AND HostApplication LIKE "%wsmprovhost.exe%" ESCAPE '\')

title: PowerShell Credential Prompt - 09D94C39
description: Detects PowerShell calling a credential prompt
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4104" AND (Message LIKE "%PromptForCredential%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: PowerShell Called from an Executable Version Mismatch - 6011C4B2
description: Detects PowerShell called from an executable by the version mismatch method
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Windows PowerShell" AND EventID = "400" AND (EngineVersion LIKE "2.%" ESCAPE '\' OR EngineVersion LIKE "4.%" ESCAPE '\' OR EngineVersion LIKE "5.%" ESCAPE '\') AND HostVersion LIKE "3.%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Malicious PowerShell Keywords - 5EA1CF91
description: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (Message LIKE "%AdjustTokenPrivileges%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%IMAGE\_NT\_OPTIONAL\_HDR64\_MAGIC%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Microsoft.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%ReadProcessMemory.Invoke%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%SE\_PRIVILEGE\_ENABLED%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%LSA\_UNICODE\_STRING%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%MiniDumpWriteDump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PAGE\_EXECUTE\_READ%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%SECURITY\_DELEGATION%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ADJUST\_PRIVILEGES%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ALL\_ACCESS%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ASSIGN\_PRIMARY%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_DUPLICATE%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ELEVATION%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_IMPERSONATE%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_INFORMATION\_CLASS%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_PRIVILEGES%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_QUERY%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Metasploit%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Mimikatz%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Powershell Profile.ps1 Modification - 81CD7853
description: Detects a change in profile.ps1 of the Powershell profile
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" AND EventID = "11" AND TargetFilename LIKE "%\\profile.ps1%" ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE "%\\My Documents\\PowerShell\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE "%C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command Line - 6BF23067
description: Detects suspicious powershell process which includes bxor command, alternative obfuscation method to b64 encoded commands.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Windows PowerShell" AND EventID = "400" AND HostName = "ConsoleHost" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%bxor%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%join%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%char%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Dnscat Execution - 19E7263A
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4104" AND ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Start-Dnscat2%" ESCAPE '\')

title: PowerShell PSAttack - 4C858A11
description: Detects the use of PSAttack PowerShell hack tool
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4103" AND logs MATCH ('"PS ATTACK!!!"'))

title: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Specific - B42AAE92
description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (Message LIKE "% -nop -w hidden -c % [Convert]::FromBase64String%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% -w hidden -noni -nop -c "iex(New-Object%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% -w hidden -ep bypass -Enc%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%powershell.exe reg add HKCU\\software\\microsoft\\windows\\currentversion\\run%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%bypass -noprofile -windowstyle hidden (new-object system.net.webclient).download%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%iex(New-Object Net.WebClient).Download%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Data Compressed - Powershell - 3F9D62AF
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4104" AND keywords LIKE "%-Recurse%" ESCAPE '\' AND keywords LIKE "%|%" ESCAPE '\' AND keywords LIKE "%Compress-Archive%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Alternate PowerShell Hosts - 2E20CB01
description: Detects alternate PowerShell hosts potentially bypassing detections looking for powershell.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (EventID IN ("4103", "400") AND ContextInfo LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (ContextInfo = "powershell.exe" OR Message = "powershell.exe"))

title: PowerShell Create Local User - F467D626
description: Detects creation of a local user via PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND EventID = "4104" AND (Message LIKE "%New-LocalUser%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Clear PowerShell History - 3E993CA7
description: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" AND (logs MATCH ('"del (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath" OR "Set-PSReadlineOption –HistorySaveStyle SaveNothing" OR "Remove-Item (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath" OR "rm (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath"')))
